data.title: Contact EEOC
data.text:
Quick help:

General information about the laws EEOC enforces and filing a charge: 1-800-669-4000, 1-800-669-6820 (TTY for Deaf/Hard of Hearing callers only), 1-844-234-5122 (ASL Video Phone for Deaf/Hard of Hearing callers only), or info@eeoc.gov.

Ready to file a charge of employment discrimination? Go to the EEOC Public Portal.

Need to find an EEOC office? See the EEOC Office List and Jurisdictional Map

Ask us about:

1-800-669-4000

1-800-669-6820 (TTY for Deaf/Hard of Hearing callers only)

1-844-234-5122 (ASL Video Phone for Deaf/Hard of Hearing callers only)

info@eeoc.gov

Use the EEOC Public Portal to check the status of charges filed on or after September 2, 2015.

For charges filed before September 2, 2015,

contact your investigator directly

or

info@eeoc.gov

Newsroom

202-921-3191

877-869-1802 (phone)

202-663-7026 (TTY for Deaf/Hard of Hearing callers only)

202-653-6056 (FAX)

FOIA@eeoc.gov

(703) 291-0880

(866) 446-0940

(800) 828-1120 (TTY for Deaf/Hard of Hearing callers only) using the Virginia Relay Service

eeoc.traininginstitute@eeoc.gov

OIG Hotline 1-800-840-3237

inspector.general@eeoc.gov

1-800-669-4000

1-800-669-6820 (TTY for Deaf/Hard of Hearing callers only)

1-844-234-5122 (ASL Video Phone for Deaf/Hard of Hearing callers only)
